name: FNAF HTML5 Port
description:
The ENTIRE game has been recoded from scratch and the game is better optimized than before. Besides that, the game experience is slightly better but its html5 so expect bugs.

thanks for all the awesome support!

---FEATURES---

1. Freddy laughs while moving
2. Kitchen sounds play
3. Random music box in the night
4. When foxy is out of cove, the static becomes red (i had to do this to prevent V- Ram issues)
5. Images have higher resolution
6. Menu has been improved
7. Custom night now unlocks after having beaten night 6
8. good/bad ending
9. 1987 easter egg
10. Animatronic AI

---TO ADD---
1. Stars
2. (?) golden freddy (?)
3. Pause menu

---KNOWN BUGS---

power system is kind of broken at the moment
foxy is pretty quick
freddy not easily spottable on camera's (except the corner camera)
music box plays multiple times per night
stage sometimes is full while some of the animatronics are gone
freddy sometimes moves in night 1/2
chica doesnt appear in bathroom

Game has been released!

versions release date's:

1.6.0-pre3 [RELEASED ON 8/16/2022]
